sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: ROSTAK a city of Arabia, in the district of Ommon. It is the residence of the imaum ; but Muskat is the chief town through which the intercourse with the Europeans is carried on. It is situated near Jebel Akdar, the largest and highest mountain in Ommon, and is celebrated for its fine grapes. It is seventy miles west from Muskat.
